title: ALL ALONE!  Cult-Mom LORI VALLOW legal team and judge QUIT CASE!  WHY??
itunes:title: ALL ALONE!  Cult-Mom LORI VALLOW legal team and judge QUIT CASE!  WHY??
description:
The players in Lori Vallow's felony case surrounding her two missing Idaho children are changing. The judge presiding over the case has stepped down, and two of her attorneys withdraw from representing her. In the meantime, Vallow's continues to proclaim her innocence.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Darryl Cohen - Former Assistant District Attorney, Fulton County, Georgia, Defense Attorney
  • Joseph Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics Jacksonville State University & author of "Blood Beneath My Feet"
  • Dr. Angela Arnold - Psychiatrist 
  • Scott Hall - Bail Bondsman & former president of the National Association of Professional Bondsmen 
  • Nate Eaton - Reporter for East Idaho News


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
